address: Thị trấn Long Hồ, Huyện Long Hồ, Tỉnh Vĩnh Long
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Thị trấn Long Hồ"**

Okay, so I'm tasked with figuring out the new administrative unit for "Thị trấn Long Hồ" in "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long". My first step is always to verify the old ward and province names. Straightforward, "Thị trấn Long Hồ" and "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long", respectively.  Now, given my expertise in these matters, the process becomes quite structured.

Since Vĩnh Long was part of a merger involving Bến Tre and Trà Vinh, the provincial resolution (60-NQ/TW) is important. It confirms that the province name itself remains unchanged, which will influence my output for the `province_name` parameter. This is a crucial first check for any region that might have undergone reorganization.

Next, I diligently reviewed the resolutions, focusing on those mentioning "Long Hồ" or "Thị trấn Long Hồ" within "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long".  "1687/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Vĩnh Long" immediately caught my eye. Line 6 within that resolution is a gold mine: it clearly states that "Thị trấn Long Hồ", along with Long An and Long Phước, would be merged into a new "xã Long Hồ". Bingo!  Perfect match in terms of provincial context!

Following this confirmation, I cross-referenced the "New Wards" data.  Sure enough, I found `{"ward_name":"Xã Long Hồ","province_name":"Tỉnh Vĩnh Long"}` which validates the transformation. This is what I expect: a one-to-one mapping in this scenario.

I'm confident in the output I'll construct.  My confidence is `high` because of the direct and explicit nature of the resolution.  The `citation` will pull directly from Resolution 1687, line 6. The province name will be "Tỉnh Vĩnh Long" which is what the New Wards data confirmed and the resolution stated. The ward code and name are then pulled directly from the New Wards data as well.

Before finalizing, I quickly double-checked for any alternate interpretations, other resolutions or areas, just to be thorough. The other resolutions were very clear, so there is only one candidate for the new administrative unit.

citation.header: 1687/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Vĩnh Long
citation.line: 6. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Long Hồ, xã Long An và xã Long Phước thànhxã mới có tên gọilà**xã Long Hồ**.
